html.p: The Dwarf accepts your gift with a smile and ushers you indoors. You're soon eating fine rabbit stew and quaffing dwarven ale, and the Dwarf tells you his name is Darkflint. He doesn't say why he lives here, and you don't ask. For your part, you tell him only that you're making for Rentarn. It's growing late and, while you don't fear the Dwarf, you're not sure what else to say. You shouldn't be giving anything away about your destination! If you are content just to sleep here, click here. If you want to risk asking the Dwarf about something else, will it be about:
